website_summaries.verdict: Unique design uses slip-on entry but still provides a snug fit. They work well for everyday use or as an cross-training exercise shoe.
pros: Lightweight, making them comfortable for all-day use
Unique design makes them stand out from the crowd
cons: Some people have trouble with the slip-on entry
Fit can be a bit tight some consumers report needing a half-size larger

customer_reviews.title: The best pair of Puma's I own
customer_reviews.text: Omg I can't deal with how perfect these sneakers are! I kinda wish they only made them for me now that people will see how good they're are. Light on your feet and very very comfortable. I hardly write reviews but I just received them in the mail right now and I had to let all you potential buyers know that these shoes are definitely fashionable and very comfortable to train in. So inlove, I will be buying the grey ones ASAP! I took 4 photos so you guys can see! I wear a size 9 and they fit absolutely perfect! I have medium to narrow feet so you can see in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Hector orozco

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏾 Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite shoes! They are so comfy and you can wear them all day long! Good for school (college, if you walk a lot around campus) and I wore them to the gym once! Definitely true to size! I usually wear 8 and that's what I got, it fits like a glove! I received them right on time, which is always a plus! I will be ordering more of them in different colors soon!🙌🏾🙌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe to use for cardio kickboxing!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these shoes! I needed something for my cardio kickboxing class as I've been using my running shoes for it and wanted something without laces to mess with. I'm a true size 7 in sneakers and ordered size 7 for this and it fit perfectly! Even with socks it didn't feel tight on my feet, just right. The top part of the shoe (the elongated tongue) also provided cushion for when I do roundkicks on the bag. Only annoying thing is that when doing mountain climbers, it feels like my shoe might slip off but it may just take getting used to as it's the first day I've broken them in.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I read multiple reviews before ordering these because I wanted to make sure I got the right size. I typically wear a 7.5-8 depending on how the sizing of the brand runs. Most of the time, I am a true size 7.5, so that is what I ordered. I saw several mixed reviews... some said they ran small, and some said they ran large. In my opinion they run perfectly true to size. I would recommend ordering your normal size, or trying them on in store first. They are extremely comfortable shoes. I plan on purchasing other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Yassss! Just what I expected. I got these ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. I got these because I wanted a neutral colour that would go with mother outfits and it's just right. More on the white side than black and the soles are not as hard on the bottom as I expected, the sides also have a bit of a plastic feel that I don't like if you check the pictures I have posted you can actually see the glossy black plastic looking side. Makes it seem cheap but I checked and it's an authentic sneaker so I just hope it's still going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: May have to send back
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these Puma shoes the highest Stars you could get but two weeks after having them and only worn them twice the very right side of one of the flaps that go across the front of the shoe begin to can't come a loose from the threading so I super glued it and if that doesn't hold I'm going to have to send them back thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes dry rotted
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel of these shoes. They were wonderful. I didn’t wear them for about two months, and unfortunately the back of the high top dry rotted. Strange and really annoying, since they look brand new. The material in the inside became dry, brittle, and spiky, so I couldn’t put the shoes on without hurting myself. I have quite a few pairs of old shoes I keep in the garage for painting, mowing the grass, and other house work, and even those old things that stay in an outside garage haven’t dry rotted and some of them are more than a few years old.
customer_reviews.author: jessica fricke

customer_reviews.title: In love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so amazed by how stylish and cute this shoe is. It's comfortably soft and fits perfectly. Definitely won't be working out in these. I ordered a size 8.5 and they fit true to size. Just like Jordan's they're a little hard to slip on. None the less I am in Love they're too hottttttt
customer_reviews.author: itz_kereece

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Shoe but not a Fitness Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the shoe. It is a shoe for looks and for general walking around. It is NOT a fitness shoe and wouldn't be good for working out or long walks as the sole is not padded. I get so many compliments on this shoe that I may order it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: They were a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my sister who wears a 9 1/2 to a 10. I initially had in my cart the prior, but before shipment i changed it to the latter. And I'm glad i did. See i had realized that ppl with wide feet (sibling) should go up the half size. While the narrow feet ppl can actually down size by a half!? At least in my case bc I have narrow feet but not long toes. Lol. Anywho, she afford them, fell in love at first sight and thanked me to many times to count! Thank you Amazon for helping me to make her happy
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: I just received my Pumas and they are the most comfortable work out shoe I’ve ever purchased in my life
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I just received my Pumas and they are the most comfortable work out shoe I’ve ever purchased in my life! I’m actually going back on right now to order a different color. If you’re looking for a shoe that fits like the size, comfy to the foot and is very light weight for working out this is the shoe for you! So so excited that I found a shoe that is fantastic! You will not be sorry purchased these right now ! And I love the no show lace part !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So I brought a size 9 , but due to me reading reviews from other customers saying the run a bit small and to size up an so I brought 9 in a half instead . 9 would have worked out fine. I'm still happy with my new kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gym Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first (black) pair I ordered, so had to order a white pair. Super comfortable, excellent fit. I wear these at the gym and they are great for squats and deadlifts since they fairly flat. These are not running shoes, more for cross-training...you could try to run in them, but I personally prefer a separate very cushioned running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: First pair of Pumas!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Pumas! (I'm usually a Nike girl) I never gave Puma a second thought until their fierce collection came out. I live the new look. I've had these shoes for over half a year and I want more Puma shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute, and sleek!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute! With the mixed reviews on fit, I decided to err on the side of caution and order a size up since my feet are a little wider, I could have gone without the size up but they're comfortable, cute, and I don't really mind the extra room. I will definitely be ordering these in other colors. If one could have a dressier sneaker, this would be it.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because they looked cool, but as a bonus they are insanely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they looked cool, but as a bonus they are insanely comfortable. They slip on and off, but between the strong elastic where laces would normally be, and the higher "tongue" and back, they feel very secure. I have not (yet) tried to work out in them but am pretty confident they'd stay on just fine. They also provide a lot of support for my heel - it's cushiony without feeling mushy. And again, they look really cool - I get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Bayley

customer_reviews.title: Very Affordable, Comfortable, and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes about a month ago but hadn't worn them until yesterday. I can honestly say that my picky feet were super happy! Usually it takes me a little while to know if a shoe is going to work for me but not these! I have very flat feet so it's hard for me to find a good shoe. When I took my first few steps I fell in love with these shoes! I did not buy these shoes for anything other than affordability, style, and comfort so they met all of my expectations in those categories! I will definitely be buying them in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: they are still in great condition and very stylish
customer_reviews.text: It was kinda small at first because my feet are flat and wide but I have had these shoes for a long time now and it fits perfectly now. Just had to wear them in, they are still in great condition and very stylish. I have been complicated many times when I wear these shoes. Since I have flat feet, I also wear compression socks with these shoes. I recommend them, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Nala Lava

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL but didn't fit..
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are BEAUTIFUL! Just a little too small for me (usually a 9, but the heel of my foot couldn't fit in and I didn't want to force and risk damaging the shoes). So, while my foot fit in, it was just the heel that couldn't get in, there was something on the heel of the shoe that didn't bend. These are absolutely beautiful and prettier in reality. The pictures don't really give it credit, but review pictures do.
customer_reviews.author: CaféÔLait

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Maybe not as functional as I'd like tho...
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and feel of these shoes, get a lot of compliments, but...I really don't like that when I do weighted lunges the heel of my supporting left slips out. I feel off balance and unsteady, and of course you can't tighten them. Also, when I do hip thrusts my toes feel like they could bust out the meshy front portion. So, if I don't wear them on glute day, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best lazy athletic shies ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. When you put them on they fit snug. Thry broke in in about 5 dats and thet perform extermely well in thr gym. I go to the gym 6 days of 5hr week and they have been holdung up with both my cardio and strengt h training regimens. I will say that they hug your feet but it not painful at all, i have sort of a eude foot and i was worried they would hurt. They look great, easy to put on, and so far they have not slipped off, unless i wanted them to. Wonderful shoes. I will update with how long they lasted later on
customer_reviews.author: Helen Pak

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and very comfortable but not for weightlifting
customer_reviews.text: As many of other posts state, this shoe is very stylish. It's also super comfy. It pulls on and off, so it's very much a bootie shoe. I wouldn't recommend these shoes for working out. They don't grip well when performing weightlifting like barbell squats or deadlifts.
customer_reviews.author: Rai

customer_reviews.title: the white gets dingy pretty fast, and the mesh overlay over the toebox ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 11yo son - he loves them and it makes life easier for everyone to not deal with shoelaces! As I expected would happen, the white gets dingy pretty fast, and the mesh overlay over the toebox has started to fray a bit, but that's after a couple months of hard wear and play by an active 11yo.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: this shoe is so cute and best shoe ever made on comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Nike girl ever since grade school. However, this shoe is so cute and best shoe ever made on comfort. I can walk in these all day with no problems. I've mentioned to several of family & friends just b/c of the comfort. I may be turning a new leaf with PUMA. I'm looking for other colors to purchase. I'm a size 6.5 and the bought size 7 and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bookie

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty! I've hated anything that came close to resembling high tops since the 80s, with that kind of moon boot bulkyness, due to my thinish legs and my big-ish feet, but they looked quite nice so I took a chance on ordered them and they manage to be very...sleek, is the best word I can manage. I'm impressed and pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Best workout shoe I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! If you take or teach high intensity group fitness classes like Strong by Zumba or Insanity then you need these shoes! Offer lots of cushion for high impact moves, nice ankle support, easy to get on and off, no laces to become untied. Because of the shoe style you work different muscles in your feet so take some time (about 3 Days for me) to get used to them. Amazon has the best price point on these shoes as they are almost 100.00 and higher elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: heather lockard

customer_reviews.title: Great style and fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these well-made shoes. Extremely comfortable and stylish. I saw them on another person and just had to have them. Wore them and walked all over Spain and Paris people asked where I got them. I hope Puma keeps manufacturing this style. I have a high instep and was worried they would not slip on but the design is so good it stretches to make it easy to put them on!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes ever! I love how I can just slip my feet in and run out the door. They are extremely comfortable and I enjoy that they are all black (my favorite color to wear). Very cushiony and well made ♥ I recommend getting a half size up because the elastic around the shoe can be a bit constricting if you choose your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 to a 9 1/2 in pumas just depending whether or not I'm wearing socks with the sneaker. But ever since my first pair I'm hooked these sneakers are sssoooo comfortable and I put them to test with my job (I work in a warehouse) on my feet for 10 to 12 hours. These are as good as skechers (memory foam) with more style.
customer_reviews.author: K. Monds

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were an absolute stea esp for the price! I got the grey/silver and the lettering/silver accent make it my most stylish shoes to date. I was concerned that these would accidentally come off somehow since they’re slip on but they are super easy to get into and very snug. Extremely comfortable as well and so far I’ve done a variety of excercises with them. One of my best investments and I’m highly considering purchasing other colors. Fits true to size!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good quality, great fit
customer_reviews.text: These are the first non-tie training shoes I've ever used, so I was a little uncertain as to how they would work. I teach dance fitness and they certainly deliver! Great fit, comfortable, easy to get on and off, good support and cushioning. All around great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Profplaydoe

customer_reviews.title: Made out of cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Toward the heal inside it seems to have like a cardboard that flips and makes it hard to walk so unless I use a shoe horn I can’t wear the sneaker. It bothers me... they are made out of very cheap materials!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Funky and pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable shoes, great for walking and cross training. The reason I gave them 4 stars is that they are tight on the upper foot where the elastic band (I have wide feet) i m hoping they will get looser with time, other than that they look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: RANA

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kicks
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes I got these because I hated the style of the champions I bought last year they aren't as comfortable but they still fit nicely and they're definitely more of the look I was going for
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: Nice look and feel but found it to be a half size too small. Ordered my usual 9 and my foot took up all of the space in the shoe. Would recomend going half size up expecially if you are going to be wearing sport socks.
customer_reviews.author: Didi B.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes weren’t made for walking!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so uncomfortable. They aren’t for long term wear. Maybe for sitting. When I have a day of walking, my feet hurt for hours to days afterwards. Hurts so much, I walk with a limp.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Harris

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are HOT!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fire! Pictures don't do these justice. I'm normally between a 7.5 and 8, I went with 8 and it fits great! Very comfortable. These look too nice to be worn as work out shoes so these are my go to sneakers to wear out (I'm normally a heel/boot girl). These are girly,yet have an edgy look that I love. Now I'm plotting on how I can get more in different colors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thankful

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 1/2 in shoes so when I read all the reviews about going a size up. I was tore between getting my size 9 1/2 or going up to a size 10. So I took a chance and got my size 9 1/2 . And I'm glad I did cause the fit is great and it isn't tight. It fits just right. I'm glad I stuck to my shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: dee arm

customer_reviews.title: Happy I Bought These Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! I ordered a size 6 in all black and they fit true to size. I love the ease of just slipping the shoes on and going on about your day. As a dancer, I put these to the test by dancing for 3 hours straight at the studio. They're light enough to jump, turn, run, train, etc. My only con for these would be that only one shoe was packed with the shoe shaper thingy and paper. I like to keep those to keep the shape of the shoes while they're not being worn. Other than that, I wish I brought these sooner!
customer_reviews.author: britney

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 and a half in women’s but I got a 9 and a half in these they were way too small like I needed to go a whole size up and get them I’m a 10 and half so the 10 and a half was out of stock and once they got back in stock the price had went up by 50 dollars smh.
customer_reviews.author: S.S

customer_reviews.title: TRUE TO SIZE & LOOK GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these puma sneakers for my grand daughter for doing good in school, this was her reward. These sneakers look so cute on her that I am thinking about getting the hot pink ones for myself. My grand daughter wears a size 9.5 and these fit her perfectly, so they are true to size. She loves the no laces to come untied. She had no problem slipping them on. They seem to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: timeforachange

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They are super cute and comfortable. This is my 4th pair. They are true to size. I wear these when I am weight lifting or on the weekend relaxing running errands. Due to my arch issues, I do not use these to do squats and cross fit movements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon, Customer LAA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sneaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker is my favourite. Perfect arch and ankle support. I was in these for over 12 hours last Saturday and my feet, legs and back are so grateful because the support and comfort were so perfect. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: I sincerely don't see anything wrong with these shoes. Buyers beware, reviews are a matter of opinion so they are highly biased. They are comfortable, New and look so good. I can't understand how people came to not appreciate it. I did order half a size up so that I can wear them with socks and also keep them for a long time. Please guys I don't usually post reviews but go get yours!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes feel like a cushion
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel like a cushion:) They are super comfortable, my job requires me to stand all day and these shoes are not only stylish but comfortable, i have no complaints whatsoever, and i highly recommend it:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hot shoes! TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them very much! They are extremely comfortable and 100% true to size. I got them half a size smaller cause my friend has these as well and hers stretched out after a while of use. I personally would have preferred getting my actual size but that was my fault. Anyhow I’m obsessed with them. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers. I have a pair of the Fenty ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneakers. I have a pair of the Fenty Pumas in grey which are similar and i like the way those fit better. I ordered a half size up based on reviews (8.5) fit with a little extra space but can be fixed with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Runs really large. I slide right out of them when working out. But I love the look and they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kortney F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers. Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Wear size 8. Bought half size smaller because of front-mesh. Fit perfectly. Shoes can look a little big, so if your foot is bigger than a size 8, and you're slender, they may look a little "doofy".
customer_reviews.author: Lady A

customer_reviews.title: sleek and very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high instep and I must say these shoes are perfect! It does provide very good support whether I am walking or cross training. The beauty of these shoes also lies in the fact that there is no limitation. I may wear it to the gym or I can dress it up for a casual day out and look bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Kizz

customer_reviews.title: Why is there a gap?
customer_reviews.text: I really love this shoe & color. But the red ones have a defect with a huge gap between the mesh & the PUMA strap. As you can see the black ones are sewn to not have that gap. I am not sure why the red ones arenot sewn but once worn, makes your shoe/foot look wide & not snug to the foot. Hopefully my replacement will be correct. I will post an update. But I really love these shoes, hope to not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love it, exactly as pictured and very comfortable. Wore it fir The first time and I actually did a lot of walking and I got great support from it. Definitely will buy another pair in a different color. Pretty true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Chellez 27

customer_reviews.title: Good athletic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Have it in multiple colors. Because it does not have laces and is an athletic shoe it is made to be snug. If debating between sizes, you may consider going with the higher.
customer_reviews.author: Heather O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style!
customer_reviews.text: These were very cute and comfortable for the workout classes that I do! I am very happy with them! They fit well and true to size. They have no laces so they are tight (To make sure they stay on your feet). So if you have extra wide feet then be cautious. I have only worn them a couple times so the could stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: they are part of my collection I love them more with the color that they arrive
customer_reviews.text: they are part of my collection I love them more with the color that they arrive, it's saids in the info and shows in the picture that they are supposed to be grey but they are not- i love the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about ordering these after hearing different reviews but I am glad I took a chance on these.These shoes are amazing. They are super comfy and super cute. They fit true to size. It Wasn't too narrow and easy to slip on. Did I mention they are super cute?? Loved my purchase. Will be purchasing more in a different color soon!
customer_reviews.author: NatashaB

customer_reviews.title: So cute, too bad they didn't fit!
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes! I really liked them, unfortunately I bought a half size bigger because they were sold out of my size. Shoes were too big and I had to return them! I would definitely buy again if I ever found my size at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: ANN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes I bought them to wear to the gym. I can use them from anything such as playing volleyball to heavy lifting. They don’t make my feet appear bulky. They aren’t too tight or too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute. But i do not feel i could work out in these . Maybe lifting but no cardio. They fit well length but without straps they are a tad loose. I wear them just for a cute pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Erica T. Wagener

customer_reviews.title: Honest Reviews Only. Peace
customer_reviews.text: Now I have 2 red workout shoes. Love them because we have high arches and it has an arch cushion bottom. Lightweight and comfy. Perfect for cross training.
customer_reviews.author: J. GIJ-Mags

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! And the price is great
customer_reviews.author: Camille Denise Reid

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sneakers!!!! They look so great with legging and a sweatshirt. The fit is perfect and my feet felt great in them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista19

customer_reviews.title: They fit fine but there is a lot of room around the ...
customer_reviews.text: I know from another pair of pumas to order a half size up so I did with these. They fit fine but there is a lot of room around the toes (not the big toe but the remaining 4 toes) it's kinda weird because I've never felt that in a shoe. Nonetheless they feel and fit fine (which is why I gave them 5 stars). And they're sexy. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Fee Fee ADOS

customer_reviews.title: Fierce and Fab! U need them!
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not purchase any athletic footwear that resembles a mans shoe, but I couldn't resist trying them, based on the long list of positive reviews. I'm glad I did too!😉...They are 1/2 size large. They are beyond cozy and light. I have to get used to the slip on no laces, but that's no biggie. These are part of Puma and Fenty footwear. Love'm lots! I purchased the White/Black. I returned them because they went on sale and I couldn't get adjustment because of the date I purchased them...so I repurchased 7.5 at Nordies and they price matched! Shame on Amazon for not bending the rules for a gr8 customer!
customer_reviews.author: CattB

customer_reviews.title: Great for cross training
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cross training. I use these for My cardio workouts. I like that there are no laces, easy to slip on and slip off but they’re sturdy once they’re on
customer_reviews.author: Sahara

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my niece and she loves them run a lil small she says suggest a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: wild boy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and So Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice and are suuuuuper comfortable. It’s like walking on a cloud. They also appear to be made really well and sturdy, high quality, like they will last awhile. Definitely worth the 50 bucks! I got the black on black.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because they looked just like the ones I've worn for almost 2 years and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they looked just like the ones I've worn for almost 2 years and I was looking for a replacement. Unfortunately, I had to return them because they just weren't the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are comfortable I read some of the reviews that the shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable I read some of the reviews that the shoe runs small, I order a 1/2 size larger, they do fit but they make my feet look bigger... I would say get your regular size, unless u have wide feet.. I wear a 6/1/2, and ordered a 7😑 I plan on getting another color in my right size😉
customer_reviews.author: Triniilove

customer_reviews.title: shoe is not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size seven which is the size I wear in all women's sneakers and I could not get my foot in this shoe..at all.. my 8 year daughter wears a 4 in sneaker and I ended up giving them to her and they fit her just right..i love the shoe so I'm going to order another pair up in size and hopefully I won't have the same problem
customer_reviews.author: Lakesa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love them and so do other due to the compliments. They are light weight and gorge. I think I'm going to buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: A StreetHawk

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect comfortable. However I do not like the shine parts and the round front. Came as expected and packaging was ok . I have worn them as yet but will give an update as soon I do.
customer_reviews.author: pet

customer_reviews.title: Sent women’s size, not men’s
customer_reviews.text: I love it - it’s the perfect fit. I had to exchange a few ones before because I was sent women’s size instead of men’s (as indicated on the site). The shoes are comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOVE THIS SNEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I looooooove these shoes. They are light yet fit comfortably on a wide foot. I have them in black and will definitely order other colors. Best show i own by far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Schneka H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shoe! I could wear it everyday. It super comfortable. When I wear it people always stop me and compliment it and inquire as to where I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: BaileyP

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: When you initially put them on they feel a bit snug but then I just realized that’s just the shoe giving me proper support I don’t usually have in most my shoes. Great for school when I’m on my feet all day and have to wear all black shoes. And very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Feel great doing Bootcamp. The only drawback is your foot slips for instance when you’re doing mountain climbers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! This is my second pair so far. Comfortable, sporty & true to size. I received the red ones today & they are so pretty & bright! I've already ordered a third pair 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Brittney P.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Need to get at least half a size bigger. And very hard to put in
customer_reviews.author: yamiley santana

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and very stylish! Great for teaching my group fitness classes, I LOVE them! Wish there were more colors to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: A. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on and off...sort of like a high-top swim shoe
customer_reviews.text: Too small on one foot. Hard to get on and off...sort of like a high-top swim shoe...not a lot of stretch. I did return them, but still love the style of PUMAs and will keep shopping the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these kylie jenner inspired! I'll post pics shortly. I'm on a mission to get every color!
customer_reviews.author: jbran

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they are really comfortable and thick. Ive always worn a size 7 in shoes, but for some reason with these a size 7 felt a little tight. Also I found they developed a smell, like payless shoes LOL idk maybe i was doing too much in them. Other than my own personal issues I think they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Not only are they stylist but very comfortable I wear to the gym and work bought in gray, true blue and black love them
customer_reviews.author: Tikesha Brown

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these sneakers. I put them on as soon I received them.,, I would have given it a 5 start but they not true to size. They run a little big and feel like they will stretch... products was nicely wrapped, clean and arrived in 1 1/2 days
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy they are exactly like the picture And they are real!!!!!! Very comfortable fit and runs very true to size I'm usually a 9 in women's but I got a 9 and a half to be safe and I see I would have been fine in a 9 will he buying all.Colors lol....Thank you im very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Nicole turner

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I loved to show, but I had to return it. I wear an 8, but I ordered an 8.5 and it was wayyyyy to tiny. I found a 9.5😳 in store and it fit perfectly, so for me the shoe ran small. I loved the texture of it and it was comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheramie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not for intense workouts
customer_reviews.text: These look nice, but without any way to tighten them to your feet, they are not good for working out. Buy them only if your doing light workout or for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Erik C. Boehm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great! Came sooner than expected. Would definitely buy in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Charms

customer_reviews.title: Love them, they are confy fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love them, they are confy fit as expected, they are like the ones from back to the future, super cute. Im buying another pair
customer_reviews.author: Sindel

customer_reviews.title: They are a good light weight shoe but they need to make these ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a good light weight shoe but they need to make these in wide, I have wide fit and man I wore them for about 20 min and they where killing me. I was not even walking I could only imagine how painful it would be if someone with wide feet would try to wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Lesslie_lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These might be the best shoes I've ever owned. I had to spend too many hours on my retail job and my old shoes were just hurting me too much. I'm so glad I got these, they are extremely comfy plus they can be very fashionable too, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Go buy your size
customer_reviews.text: I thought the sizing was going by mens to women. I go the wrong size and now I can't return it. It's in a box somewhere in the closet still new. Needed a 8.5 for women got a 6.5 for women.
customer_reviews.author: NNM

customer_reviews.title: Puma T-Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are quite comfortable and I love that I am able to slide them on quickly for our daily two mile walk. The look great with black tights and jeans. Truly love them
customer_reviews.author: Misa

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, affordable and cute! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Brought them for my workouts at the gym. Besides my daughter, mom and sister own a pair! Just like they’ve stated to me these sneakers are extremely comfortable and I couldn’t resist the price! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: NonelikeNoni

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable sneakers I own! They're great for weight training and everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.text: Got so many compliments. Love it! Will be purchasing more. Please get more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do not run small
customer_reviews.text: Length wise they do not run small at all. If anything, almost 1/2 size too long. I can't vouch for the width because I don't have wide feet. Overall, extremely comfortable right out of the box and very cute on. Absolutely no pinch points (which happens with high top shoes).
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: You cant go wrong with Pumas! Fit as expected. Comfy and great looking. You can work out with them, run or travel. Everyone’s envious.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, some may want to size up if wearing with socks
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable, I don’t wear them with socks, they tend to feel a little too snug when I pair them with ankle socks.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Evelyn

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Fierce Core Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description:
Designed to be both versatile and functional. Rihanna inspired collections including the fierce mix performance ready technology with trend right silhouettes and details. Optimal comfort and supportive upper. Medial and lateral support for 360 degree movement. Exaggerated heel thickness at both sides for greater stability

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Lace-less high-top cross-trainer with breathable mesh insets and goring across the top for a secure fit
Padded tongue and collar with pull loops
Pivot points at outsole , heel and toe for 360 degrees of movement
